eu_initiatives: We work with our 43 partner groups in Europe to support patients, raise awareness of colorectal cancer and digestive cancer plus advocate for the best treatment care and screening across all EU countries
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar

goals__remit:
EuropaColon is committed to preventing deaths from colorectal and other digestive cancers and improving the quality of life and support for those affected by the disease 
 
Our 4 Key Goals 
To reduce the numbers of European citizens affected by colorectal and digestive cancers 
To identify digestive cancers at an early stage 
To ensure access to best treatment and care for all European patients 
To support novel and innovative research into digestive cancers
relevant_communication:
White Paper on colorectal cancer treatment 
Annual review 
Meetings in the EU Parliament  
Collaboration with other NGO and clinical stakeholders in Europe on health issues 
bi-annual Barometer of relevant health indicators
